thread.title: Wendi Hutchinson
thread.title_full: Plumb Warehouse reviewed by Wendi Hutchinson

author: Wendi Hutchinson
title: Wendi Hutchinson
text: I have been researching manufacturers and ranges for some time to replace two bathrooms and once I had chosen the products I researched online for prices. The two main suppliers we selected to purchase were both available from Plumb Warehouse. When I rang them to ask a few questions about the ranges, Lee could not have been more helpful. He was also patient with my various questions and I ended up buying more from them rather than another website because of his helpful attitude. When I finally ordered late in the afternoon, all the items (with the exception of the made to order taps and shower) were delivered the next day. I am now going to buy my kitchen and laundry room taps and sinks from them because of how helpful they were and because their prices are very competitive.
